title: 服务器日志问题
author: QWQ丿QAQ
txt_content:
请问这条日志应该是不影响服务器的但是看着有点难受能关掉嘛，在哪里关掉
[16:31:34] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[16:31:34] [Server thread/WARN]: Tinkers Alloying Addon loaded a new chunk [-6, -70] in dimension 0 (overworld) while populating chun
k [-6, -69], causing cascading worldgen lag.复制代码

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
config\forge.cfg
    # Log cascading chunk generation issues during terrain population.
    B:logCascadingWorldGeneration=true
设为false

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
这是提示你，某个 mod 的生成区块可能会导致巨大的卡顿。

在这关闭。 config/forge.cfg 中，设置     B:logCascadingWorldGeneration=false

replies.author: QWQ丿QAQ
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-5-13 16:36
config\forge.cfg
    # Log cascading chunk generation issues during terrain population.
    B:logCas ...
谢谢大佬请问这个是什么原因引起的呢？

replies.author: QWQ丿QAQ
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-13 16:36
这是提示你，某个 mod 的生成区块可能会导致巨大的卡顿。

在这关闭。 config/forge.cfg 中，设置     B:lo ...
好的 谢谢大佬

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
QWQ丿QAQ 发表于 2020-5-13 16:52
好的 谢谢大佬
不是我先回复的吗。。

replies.txt_content:
